text: phir jab huramat ke chaar maheene guzar jaen to musharikon ko jahaan pao (be taammul) katl karo aur unako giraphtaar kar lo aur unako kaid karo aur har ghaat kee jagah mein unakee taak mein baitho phir agar vah log (ab bhee shirk se) baaz aaain aur namaaz padhane lagen aur zakaat de to unakee raah chhod do (unase taarooz na karo) beshak khuda bada bakhshane vaala meharabaan hai
